message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take a bit more, but still a fair offer!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but still keep some for myself!
You're getting close to giving up, but I'll give you one last chance!
I'll give you a small chance to reconsider, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm not backing down, take it or leave it!
I'll give you everything, but I'm not going to lose to you!
